revised_title: Intimate Structure of Crystals and Aconitine Pharmacology
tldr: This article discusses two separate presentations. The first one is about the intimate structure of crystals by M. Hicks, F.R.S. The second presentation is on the pharmacology of Aconitine, Diacetyl-Aconitine, Lenzaconine, and Aconine, considering their chemical constitution, in relation to their effects on the human body.
